name: The First Lesson
desc: We'll be introducing the very basics of the HTML document and what it is.
We'll also look at how to use the t[h1], t[button], and t[br] elements.
takeaways: h[index.html] is the name for a homepage file
An HTML file let's us put content in a website
HTML is made up of pieces called h[elements]
What the t[h1], t[button], and t[br] elements are
What an opening and closing tag is

sections.head: What Will We Be Doing in This Lesson?
text: Looking at the basics of HTML by using <h1>, <button>, and <br> elements.
